task.summary: Default task
modify README.md
start Echo

Status: one-turn paxos server-client model, without separate i/o channel & paxos agent
Working on:
* Echo.scmodel
REMAINS:
+ logger is working properly + cannot separate registration and paxos procedures + proposal number is increased sequentially + integrated paxos agent & i/o channel

Status: reconstruct proposer, separate two stages of action and add timeout mechanism
Working on:
* Echo.scmodel * Echo.agent
REMAINS:
+ logger is working properly + proposal number is increased sequentially + integrated paxos agent & i/o channel + Paxos message construction and interpretation are not reliable
